page.title: 09HOME APPLIANCES, HOCKLIFFE
page.content: This survey represents 12% of Hockliffe's home appliances in 1985, based on information received from a questionnaire. The results also gave us information about cooking and heating methods. We learned that there was no gas laid to the village. 1){100%}had a fridge & television 2) {96.4%}had a radio 3) {89.3%}had a tape-recorder 4) {75%}had their own transport 5) {71.4%}had a hi-fi & a freezer 6) {64.3%}had a blender/mixer 7) {46.4%}had a coffee maker 8) {42.9%}had a video recorder 9) {32.1%}had a teasmade 10){28.6%}had a home computer 11){25%}had an electric organ 12){17.8%}had a microwave {COOKING:}Coal{3.5%;}Calor gas{7.1%;} Electric{67.8%: HEATING:}Coal{57.2%;} Electric{53.6%;}Oil{7.1%
